1001.name: Cave Cat Bed
1001.description: Its perfect cave-like shape lends itself to privacy, comfort, and security for your precious pet.

1002.name: Multicolor Catnip Toy
1002.description: Make your cat happy: Cute and cuddly stuffing chew toy entertains your lovely pets

1003.name: Circle Track Cat Toy
1003.description: The Catnip Chase track toy is designed with bright green colors that will entice your cat to bat and paw at the spinning ball along the circular track.

1004.name: Luxury Dog Bed
1004.description: Give your buddy the gift of sleeping on a cloud with the Bedsure Orthopedic Foam Couch Dog Bed. Bedsure’s quality products are made for and by a group of pet lovers. And they’re more than just everyday pet supplies.

1005.name: Variety Box Dog Toys
1005.description: Our box features interactive dog toys, chew toys, toys with spiky balls, squeakers, and rope, plus toys for puppies and aggressive chewers.

1006.name: Dog Puzzle Toy
1006.description: This is a fun interactive puppy toy that provides games for pets.

1007.name: Adjustable Cat Harness and Leash
1007.description: This cat harness is made of lightweight, soft, breathable air-mesh fabric, with soft edge and resilient cushioning, giving extra comfort and protection. This all weather pet vest won't be too bulky to restrain your pet's movement or overheat your lovely pet when hot, and reinforced stitching allows you to walk your pet with confidence.

1008.name: Reflective Strong Dog Leash
1008.description: Features soft padded handles for amazing comfortable, just enjoy the feeling walks with your dog and protects your hand from rope burn.

1009.name: Knitted Pet Sweater
1009.description: There is a traction leash hole near the neckline of the sweater, which is convenient for you to take your pet out for a walk.

1010.name: Soft Pet Pajamas
1010.description: The pajamas are made of super soft and comfortable fabrics. Not only will they not do any harm to the fur of pets, but they can also keep warm in the cold winter.

1011.name: Hard-Sided Cat Carrier
1011.description: Dog carrier made of durable, easy-to-clean plastic & includes built in carrying handle. Spree features a patented, quick & easy 5 step.

1012.name: Wire Dog Kennel
1012.description: Crate is equipped with front and side doors that latch securely with two-side bolt latches. Keep the doors open for a perfect den-like, personal space that your Dog Cat or Puppy will love to call home.
